CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 7, 1959, pg. 2, reads: "Constable Smith's Aides - Fifth Ward Constable Thomas J. Smith supervises the preparation of lunch for workers at the Fifth Ward's Third District polling place in Ammon Center, Tuesday. Mr. Smith is also Democratic committeeman in district, and a deputy sheriff.  Shown in the picture are C. Carter, Mrs. Adrena Allen, committeewomen, Mrs. Smith and Mrs. Rachel Carter. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Thomas J. "Tommy" Smith seated behind desk in Ammon Center
